data.actual_result: When you click cancel, you go back to the $49.99 plan for a second, but it automatically reverts back to the $99.99 plan.
data.expected_result: It should cancel the plan and automatically resub to the $49.99.
data.short_description: You cannot cancel $99.99 plan back to $49.99 plan.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the $99.99 nitro plan. - Attempt to cancel the plan. It should say it will revert back to $49.99 and your payment will be conducted at the yearly rate.
